import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import style from "./crud.module.css" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" const EditUser=()=>{ let obj=useParams() const [name ,setName] =useState("") const [salary ,setSalary] =useState("") const [company ,setCompany] =useState("") useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:5004/employees/${obj.abc}`) .then((there)=>{ setName(there.data.name) setSalary(there.data.salary) setCompany(there.data.company) }) .catch(()=>{console.log("error");}) },[]) return(

Edit-User













) } export default EditUser
